channel.title: Post on Hugo中文文档
channel.description: Recent content in Post on Hugo中文文档

item.description: Hugo Multi Bootswatch Theme Hugo Multi BootSwatch Theme is a single column theme for hugo based on Twitter Bootstrap and a css styling from Bootswatch. It is a simple template containing a nice header menu bar and content area. Default the theme support 2 types of content. pages (used for About/Resume pages) posts (used for standard blogposts) Installation Usage Configuration Built-in colour themes Screenshots Themed screenshots

Journal Journal is a single column theme for hugo based on Twitter Bootstrap and a css styling from Bootswatch the Journal theme. It is a simple template containing a nice header menu bar and content area. Default the theme support 2 types of content. pages (used for About/Resume pages) posts (used for standard blogposts) Screenshots Index Page Post Page List Page How to use Download the repository and extract to your hugo working directory (/themes/ Or read more on the main Hugo site -> Installing Hugo Themes
